title: Halo 3 - Sunrise
heading: 1.0.2 Update
body: Welcome back!|n|nIf you haven't already, be sure to grab the 1.0.2 patch from the Original Halo 3 Discord server at https://discord.gg/halo3 . This update fixes some compatibility issues with other plugins, and should fix that "Restarting Search" issue a lot of hosts have been seeing.|n|nHave fun!|n|n(Screenshot from Sven Cakemann)
